project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises:  (a) implementation of a digital overlay network for the Bulgarian Telecommunications Company (BTC) for the period 1993-1997, including digitalization of the trunk routes and renewal/expansion of the network; (b) design and implementation of a computer-based operational support system/management information system for BTC; and (c) technical assistance for the corporate development of BTC, including establishment of management functions, i.e. accounting, auditing, financial management, planning, etc.
